title: Rooney Mara looks comfortable in all black as she shops at a local farmer's market in Los Angeles
text:
She's been making the rounds as of late to support her partner, Joaquin Phoenix, in his role as the Joker.

But on Sunday, Rooney Mara opted for a more low-key outing as she spent some time shopping at a local farmer's market in Los Angeles.

The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo star, 34, looked comfortable as she sported a monochromatic ensemble in all black.

Lazy Sunday: Rooney Mara, 34, spent some time shopping at a local farmer's market in Los Angeles on Sunday

Mara paired a black jacket with black pants and classic high-top Converse All Stars for the outing.

The Carol star swept her brunette locks up into a ponytail as she carried a reusable cotton bag.

She accessorized with a pair of sleek black shades as a green plant was seen sticking out of her bag.

The Social Network actress kept her makeup, and her accessories, to a minimum for the Sunday outing.

Monochromatic: Mara paired a black jacket with black pants and classic high-top Converse All Stars for the outing

Simplicity: The Carol star swept her brunette locks up into a ponytail as she carried a reusable cotton bag

Greenery: Rooney accessorized with a pair of sleek black shades as a green plant was seen sticking out of her bag

Mara met her current partner, Phoenix, 44, when they worked together on the 2013 film Her.

Phoenix recently told People that he initially thought Mara wasn't fond of him, only to later discover that she was actually just shy.

The Walk the Line star admitted he actually googled Mara, saying it was the first time he had ever looked up a love interest online.

'She’s the only girl I ever looked up on the internet,' Phoenix said. 'We were just friends, email friends.'

The couple made their red carpet debut in 2017 at the Cannes Film Festival's closing ceremony.

Though they have yet to publicly speak out about the proposal, Mara was rocking a diamond ring on her ring finger on Sunday and US Weekly confirmed the engagement back in July.
description: Rooney Mara went on a  low-key outing on Sunday  at a farmer's market in Los Angeles. The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo star, 34, looked comfortable as she sported a monochromatic ensemble in all black.
